abstract: The Volcker Rule, which seeks to limit risk in banking by restricting proprietary trading, is a noble effort but could have unintended consequences.
snippet: The Volcker Rule, which seeks to limit risk in banking by restricting proprietary trading, is a noble effort but could have unintended consequences.
lead_paragraph: It is hard to disagree with Paul A Volcker.

headline.main: The Volcker Rule and the Costs of Good Intentions

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
